channel.title: Cattleman Revolver
channel.description:
Had fun modeling it, but after that I got a little tired of it. So I'm done with it for now, and on to a bigger project. I'll accept C&C especially on things I don't already know, but I don't plan on revisiting this =/
[img]http://somethingtohide.info/somethingtohide.info/htdocs/wp-content/uploads/2010/07/shot1.png[/img] [img]http://somethingtohide.info/somethingtohide.info/htdocs/wp-content/uploads/2010/07/shot2.png[/img]

item.title: Cattleman Revolver
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

Polycount isn’t too low, but I’m using rendertime subdivision.

Read full topic

item.title: Cattleman Revolver
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

http://picturearchive.auctionarms.com/5158125635/9330493/img_1389.jpg_thumbnail1.jpg

Use marmoset to render. Assuming it has a game poly count:
http://www.polycount.com/forum/showthread.php?t=61346&highlight=toolbag

Read full topic

item.title: Cattleman Revolver
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

Flap?

Normal mapped.

The thing is, I’m in the stage of long render times and tweaks to get it to look right. However, I have like NO time with a full time job, school, and a part time job. So I don’t have time for that and I have another project I want to start on. So today I have a complete day off and I was tired of fooling with it, so I just posted it so I could start on something new.

Read full topic

item.title: Cattleman Revolver
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Handle is way too flat
The engravings could come out more
Theres actually a flap on the spherical part right behind the chamber cylinder, but putting that in depends on how close you’ll see it
Screws look like bumps
You could make it look better by making the hammer and barrels black, along with the chamber cylinder thingy and the whole trigger gaurd

Looks good overall, your renders aren’t helping you though. Is this normal mapped or high poly?

Read full topic
